Information From the Restaurant Offers
Description: Edens Fast Food Restaurant is a American , Hamburgers , and Breakfast restaurant where most Menuism users came for a meal on the go and paid less than $10 . Tags: American, Online Ordering, Hamburgers, Breakfast, Takeout, Good For Kids, Sandwiches, Ice Cream, Frozen Yogurt, and Burgers Stats: 1 dish entered by diners at Edens Fast Food Restaurant 1 user wants to eat at Edens Fast Food Restaurant 1 user loves Edens Fast Food Restaurant

Add as friend Send Msg Edens Fast Food Restaurant DRR June 24, 2009 5.0 5.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Fresh Food - Prompt Service - Very clean
My first time there and Ioved the attentive customer service. The food freshness and the cleanliness. Can’t wait to try the lemon rice soup!!!!
